title: Mobile Suit Gundam: MS Generation
original_name: 起動戦士ガンダム MS ジェネレーション
sinopse:
Isolated short stories, set in the One Year War:

PROLOGUE "FIRST BATTLE"
FILM 1 "TANK BATTLE"
FILM 2 "TEST PIROT"
FILM 3 "DEEP ATTACK"
FILM 4 "ODETHA DAY"
FILM 5 "J&C EXPRESS"
FILM 6 "GT FORMATION"
FILM 7 "K 2"
FILM 8 "HI JACKER"
FILM 9 "WARS"
FILM 10 "CLOSE UP"

(Source: Gundam Wikia)
